camera_get_view_target: This function can be used to retrieve the follow target of the given camera. The return value can be an object index, an instance ID or -1 if no follow target has been set.
The unique camera ID value returned when you created the camera
Object Index, Instance ID, or -1 if no target is set.

{ANY_CODE} var target = camera_get_view_target(view_camera[0]);
if target != obj_Player
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}camera_set_view_target(view_camera[0], obj_Player);
{nbsp_x4}}

The above code retrieves the follow target of the camera assigned to view port[0] and then checks this to see if it matches the object index "obj_Player". If it does not then the view camera is set to follow an instance of that object.
